alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued May 04 at 1:05PM EDT until May 05 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as the low to mid 30s will result in frost formation. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett, Extreme Western Allegany and Central and Eastern Allegany Counties. In Virginia, Shenandoah County. In West Virginia, Hampshire, Hardy, Western Grant, Eastern Grant, Western Mineral and Eastern Mineral Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
